entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 10:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -15.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -18.5°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
